sn7.10:1.1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling among the Kosalans in a certain woodland thicket.
sn7.10:1.2: Now on that occasion fourteen oxen belonging to a certain brahmin of the Bhāradvāja clan had gotten lost.
sn7.10:1.3: Then the brahmin of the Bhāradvāja clan, while searching for those oxen, went to the woodland thicket where the Blessed One was staying. There he saw the Blessed One sitting with his legs folded crosswise, holding his body erect, having set up mindfulness in front of him. Having seen him, he approached the Blessed One and recited these verses in the presence of the Blessed One:
